question.body: The heart is connected to the rest of the body through the __________.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The septum divides the heart into its pumping chambers.
Incorrect. The pulmonary circulation connects the heart to the lungs.
Correct. The systemic circulation connects the heart with the rest of the body.
Incorrect. The hepatic portal system describes the circulation of blood from the digestive tract to the liver.
